'''House Cargyll''' was a vassal house from [[the Crownlands]].
sections.Known members:
* Ser [[Arryk Cargyll]], a [[knight]] of the [[Kingsguard]] who declared for King [[Aegon II Targaryen|Aegon II]] during the [[Dance of the Dragons]]. Erryk's twin
* Ser [[Erryk Cargyll]], a [[knight]] of the [[Kingsguard]] who declared for Queen [[Rhaenyra Targaryen|Rhaenyra]] during the [[Dance of the Dragons]]. Arryk's twin.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Cargyll is extinct. However, their sigil mentioned in ''The Hedge Knight'', as a member of the house participates in the [[Ashford]] Tourney.
